name: 河田成人
introduction: Born in 1963 Tokyo. After learning at a film school in Japan, Shigehito practiced entertainment contents production specialized in TV commercials and and film screenplay development in motion picture company as for many years. After he developed his career as visual effects supervisor over 10 years as experience, Shigehito founded Wonderium.Inc which is specialized visual effects and animation production. As latest experience, Shigehito worked for Appleseed Alpha (2014)_ and Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012)_ as CGI producer which were collaborated with Joseph Chou _ and Shinji Aramaki _ .
